articles.description: The COVID-19 pandemic has mandated the requirement of oral medications that can eliminate the viral load inside an infected person's body and help cure the disease.
articles.content:
• Oral medication for COVID-19 will take the load off healthcare system during the ongoing pandemic
  • Molnupiravir has been found to be the 'wonder drug' in the treatment of COVID-19
